column4: I had it working but for somereason it stopped and then it was impossible to get workign again. im going to reinstall and try again
i've never seen a GUI tool for samba that works properly. i'm in the same boat as mneptok, just edit it by hand.
besides, it has so many features that a GUI would probably never do it any justice.
maybe you can give SWAT a try. forgot how to access it though.
